title: Could you please ID this?
content:
Morning,  
I wonder if you could help me to ID this typeface.  
Thanks a lot

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426172228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeID_6331.png)
author: DumbType

comments.content:
Hi Ryuk,  
thanks so much for your kind help.  
All the best.

"Dude, what font should I use?!"  
"Just put 'espresso' in Dafont and grab the first thing that comes up."  
"Cool dude, it worked!"

hhp
